snippet.title: Illawarra junior rugby league mod and league tag finals
snippet.content:
Gallery: Illawarra junior mod and league tag finals
Step: Wests player Josiah Clifford against Thirroul Pictures: Robert Peet
Caught: Wests player Deacon Waine. Picture: Robert Peet
Stop: Thirroul's Wil Hope.
Hit-up: Thirroul player Keegan White against Wests. Picture: Robert Peet
Push: Wests player Daniel Meafou.
Charge: Thirroul player Jackson Smith.
Tagged: Shellharbour's Huntah Corcoran against Wests at Boronia Park. Picture: Robert Peet
Tackle: Thirroul player Kyan Pickthall.
Swerve: Shellharbour's Marlee Fahey. Picture: Robert Peet
exit
After the completion of the semi-finals of the Illawarra junior mod and league tag competitions the finals will be contested on Saturday at Parrish Park and Ron Costello Oval. Games are scheduled as follows: Parrish Park, Figtree 9am: 14LT Thirroul v Wests 10am: 10.1 Thirroul v Wests 10.50am: 11.2 Wests v Woonona 11.40am 12.2 Norths v Berkeley 12.30pm: 12LT Shellharbour Gold v Wests Ron Costello Oval, Shellharbour 9am: 16LT Helensburgh v Thirroul 10am: 10.2 Woonona/Thirroul v Corrimal 10.50am: 11.1 Thirroul v Collegians 11.40am: 12.1 Shellharbour v Thirroul 12.30pm: 10LT Shellharbour v Corrimal
The winners of the above games in each age group will progress to the grand finals against the winners of yesterday's major semi-finals. The grand finals will be played on Saturday, August 19 at Dapto Showground.
